#summary how to setup dev environment

= prerequisites =

 * Visual Studio 2010
 * [http://www.asp.net/mvc/mvc3 MVC 3.0]
 * [http://www.aforgenet.com/ Aforge.NET]
  * PM> Install-Package AForge.Imaging
  * PM> Install-Package AForge.Video
  * PM> Install-Package AForge.Vision
 * [http://system.data.sqlite.org/index.html/doc/trunk/www/downloads.wiki SQLLite]

= Recommended =

 * [http://sqliteadmin.orbmu2k.de/ SQLLite admin tool]
